entry.title: Bitcoin wiki is down
entry.summary: The Bitcoin wiki, located at https://en.bitcoin.it, is currently down. It is unclear what may have caused the outage or when it will be resolved. There are no known communication procedures or point persons designated for reporting issues with the Bitcoin wiki. Tom Geller, a writer and presenter based in Oberlin, Ohio, can be reached for assistance with various tasks including articles, marketing, videos, user guides, and books. His contact information can be found on his website, http://www.tomgeller.com.
